channel.title: Woothemes on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in Woothemes on Damien Saunders

item.title: Woothemes 5 for 1 Weekend special
item.description: Have you been thinking about getting a new look for your WordPress site? And not just themes, you can buy the WooCommerce extensions with up to 50% off. This weekend WooThemes are offering a number of black Friday and cybermonday specials. You can choose: Buy 1 theme get 4 extra themes (5-4-1 themes 20% off a monthly membership And many more … Click the image below …

item.title: Social Media Marketing with WordPress needs a good theme
item.description: Get a good theme – it’s all about the instant appeal that any visitor has when they first land on your site. WordPress has many themes suited for social media marketing with a magazine layout, a featured panel and ready to go marketing plugins. Why WordPress? WordPress is one of the world’s most popular solutions for blogging If you’re reading and researching Why WordPress – you’ll probably see many articles focus on three words – Free, Simple & Easy.

item.title: 6 magazine WordPress themes special from Woothemes – get it before Easter’s over
item.description:
Here is a special offer on WordPress themes you can’t beat – Woothemes is offering 5 for the price of 1 this Easter long weekend. To make it even more generous – I’m selecting 6 themes for you to make your decision even easier. One of these a is a great free WordPress theme suited for any blogger
Woothemes could be one of the best WordPress theme clubs – or it could be a great bunch of committed WordPress designers.
